name: Solo Travel
description: Experience complete freedom to explore at your own pace. Meet new people, discover yourself, and create personal adventures without compromise. Perfect for self-reflection and spontaneous detours to hidden gems most groups miss.

name: Couples
description: Romantic getaways designed for two, featuring intimate experiences from sunset cruises to private dining. Rekindle connections in luxurious settings with couple-focused activities and premium accommodations tailored for lovebirds.

name: Family
description: Stress-free vacations with activities for all ages, from toddler-friendly beaches to teen-approved adventures. Family resorts with kids' clubs, connecting rooms, and educational experiences that create lifelong memories together.

name: Friends
description: Group adventures designed for shared experiences, from party hostels to group tours. Perfect for reunions, bachelor/bachelorette trips, or just creating unforgettable stories with your closest friends.

name: Wellness
description: Rejuvenating retreats focusing on mental and physical wellbeing. Includes yoga sessions, spa treatments, meditation workshops, and healthy cuisine in serene environments designed for complete relaxation and renewal.

name: Food & Wine
description: Culinary journeys featuring cooking classes with local chefs, vineyard tours, market visits, and exclusive dining experiences. Discover regional flavors and gastronomic traditions from passionate food artisans.

name: Honeymoon
description: Luxurious romantic escapes with private villas, couple's massages, and exclusive experiences. Includes champagne breakfasts, secluded beaches, and personalized services to celebrate your new life together.

name: Volunteering
description: Meaningful trips combining travel with giving back. Participate in wildlife conservation, community development, or teaching projects while immersing yourself in local cultures and creating positive impact.

name: Summer Holidays
description: Sun-drenched adventures featuring beach resorts, water sports, and outdoor festivals. Enjoy long days exploring coastal towns, swimming in crystal waters, and dining under the stars.

name: Winter Getaways
description: Cozy mountain lodges, snowy landscapes, and apr√®s-ski relaxation. Includes skiing, snowboarding, thermal baths, and charming winter villages with festive markets and warm drinks.

name: Spring Break
description: Energetic group trips featuring beach parties, pool clubs, and non-stop entertainment. Popular destinations with vibrant nightlife, daytime excursions, and budget-friendly packages for students.

name: Christmas Markets
description: Festive trips through Europe's magical Christmas markets, featuring handmade crafts, mulled wine, and seasonal treats. Experience snow-covered towns, light displays, and traditional holiday celebrations.
